resources.string: Welcome to SkyCast! This guide will cover key features of the app and navigation directions. Scroll to a specific section for details. Happy Scrolling!
In the Home screen, you\'ll find a dropdown menu to select your preferred city. Press the \"LOAD\"

button to obtain the latest weather information for that city. The app will fetch and display the current weather information for that city by updating the weather icon and temperature using live data from our API.
The City Fragment allows you to customize your weather experience by selecting the cities you care

about most. Simply check the boxes next to your preferred cities, and they\â€™ll be instantly added to the dropdown menu in the Home Fragment. This makes it easy to quickly switch between locations and stay updated on the weather wherever you go. Want to de-clutter your list? Just uncheck a city, and it will be removed from the Home Fragment dropdown. Tailor your weather app to your needs in just a few taps!
